Articles.Content:
So i've downloaded BD. The game looks nice nothing is missing accept the BD picture at the left side when im in the hangar and the targetting cam. I launch the plane, it loads, then bam i spawn in the ground and the game dosent work.

Edited May 20, 2016 by lahygreidjr
grammar
Make sure to only install the BDArmoury folder in your KSP directory. It comes in a gamedata folder when unzipped, make sure to remove it.
